message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but that price is a bit high for me. Would you be willing to come down to $90?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about we try $110?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about we split the difference from our last offers and settle at $100?
I'm not quite ready to settle at $100, Bob. I'm willing to go a bit higher. How about we try $115?
Alice, I'm trying to be reasonable here. $105 is the highest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob, but I'm still not at $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway from our last offer, so how about $107.50?
Alice, it seems like we're getting close. How about we settle this right now at $106?
I'm not quite there yet, Bob. I'm willing to go a bit higher, but I think we can do better than $106. How about $108?
